A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So much potential\, so little fulfillment. My first complaint is what they did with Luke\, so lame. Then\, Fin's role was completely pointless. The humor was lame and cheesy. Too much of the characters saying exactly what was going on as a way to explain to the audience. Came off as too obvious. Then the whole anti rich people\, animal abuse messages were just weird. Didn't like that. The ending was pretty cool\, but a bad overall Star Wars movie. A dang shame really.
